committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Management, Organization, and Procurement
Subcommittee on Immigration, Citizenship, Refugees, Border Security, and International Law

official_title: To prohibit a Federal agency from accepting a form of individual identification issued by a foreign government, except a passport that is accepted on the date of enactment.

summary.text: Identification Integrity Act of 2007 - Prohibits federal agencies from accepting for any official purpose an identification document for an individual issued by a foreign government. Creates an exception for foreign passports authorized by federal law to be accepted for a specific official purpose.

titles.title: To prohibit a Federal agency from accepting a form of individual identification issued by a foreign government, except a passport that is accepted on the date of enactment.
